creator: thomas.mortagne@gmail.com
text: Getting sources/javadoc downloaded automatically from Maven central in whatever IDE is very useful when using JMeter API.
Would also love it if this was added. A lot easier to get started with the programmatic API.
creator: anders@f12.no
loisel.jerome@gmail.com
text: +1 on this, it's a pain to use the maven dependencies without sources, nore javadoc.
